item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0296; 07:19AM; 10211 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YpoKUy; #Northridge; It took 47 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish flames inside of a two-story commercial building (day spa). One approximately 60-year-old female was transported due to smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AR1 AR17 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E239 E275 E287 E289 E298 E39 E70 E75 E87 E88 E93 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA18 RA87 RA889 T39 T75 T87 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0950; 02:44PM; 1023 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ifp8zj; #EastHollywood; *Corrected Address* 75 LAFD Firefighters took just 63 minutes of well-coordinated defensive firefighting operations to extinguish heavy fire that destroyed a vacant, boarded two-story Craftsman-style home, the site of a previous fire, that was well involved with flames on their arrival. Firefighters were able to limit fire damage to an occupied one-story home to the north, that despite intense flames, suffered only superficial fire damage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E203 E211 E220 E227 E26 E261 E27 E52 E6 EA1 EM5 HE2 RA35 RA52 RA803 T11 T20 T27 T3 T61 UR3; CH7; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0950; 01:41PM; 1017 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YBh3dq; #EastHollywood; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on arrival at a vacant, boarded two-story Craftsman-style home well involved with fire.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM52 E20 E203 E211 E220 E227 E27 E52 E6 EM5 RA35 T11 T20 T27 T3; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0244; 06:07AM; 8900 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWbtKV; #Winnetka; PRELIM: Two vehicles collided at the intersection of WInnetka Av and Vanowen St, sending one into the yard of a nearby home, gravely injuring and trapping that driver in the wreckage. Despite the swift arrival of LAFD personnel, and their teamwork with power tools to disentangle him from the badly damaged vehicle, the man (in his 20's?) proved beyond medical help, was determined dead and remains at the scene. The driver of the other vehicle sustained only minor injuries, declined offered ambulance transportation, and remains at the scene speaking to investigators. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes in the immediate area until LAPD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #669) and Coroner.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E273 E296 E472 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA107 RA896 T73 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #YuccaFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/09/2023 INC#0095

item.description: Knockdown - #YuccaFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0095; 03:14AM; 1820 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HN4Cof; #Hollywood; *Address Corrected* 81 LAFD Firefighters took less than 90 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire within a 5,500 square-foot one story L-shaped strip mall that contained a laundromat (1820 N Cahuenga Blvd) and a convenience store (1810 N Cahuenga Blvd). No injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E35 E41 E76 E82 E89 EA1 EM11 EM14 HE1 HR3 PI3 RA27 RA803 RA82 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #YuccaFire 02/09/2023 INC#0095

item.description: Update #YuccaFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0095; 02:17AM; 6383 W Yucca St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YjSi5L; #Hollywood; *Address Remains Tentative*. 81 LAFD Firefighters now transitioned to defensive operations. No injuries reported. This Greater Alarm Structure Fire is known as the Yucca Fire. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E35 E41 E76 E82 E89 EA1 EM11 EM14 HR3 PI3 RA27 RA803 RA82 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1605; 08:55PM; 1327 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x9cs6D; #EastHollywood; The unconscious adult found outside the burning unit is now described as a 65 year-old male resident in critical condition with severe burn injuries. No other persons injured. Fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM14 RA52 RA82 T27 T29 T35; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1605; 08:15PM; 1327 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x9cs6D; #EastHollywood; PRELIM:36 Firefighters took just 20 minutes (8:35 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in one unit at the rear of a row of one story residential bungalows. An unconscious adult (no further details) discovered outside the burning unit has been transported to a regional hospital in undetermined condition. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM14 RA52 RA82 T27 T29 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
